system.benefits:
Choose one elemental energy (Fire, Water, Air, or Earth) when taking this feat. Once per turn when you hit with an unarmed strike or monk weapon, you can spend 2 Energy to empower the strike:

  • Make weaving check for chosen element (Potential + Mastery). Can take multiple times for different elements
  • 1 success: Deal +[[/damage 1d8 type=elemental]] damage
  • 2+ successes: Deal +[[/damage 2d8 type=elemental]] damage
